articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Industrial Establishments in Jagang Province
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Industrial Establishments in Jagang Province
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the industrial establishments which took the lead in the drive to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the February General Steel Enterprise.
					
					 Going round the UHP electric arc furnace newly built by the enterprise and its steel shop and other production processes, he acquainted himself in detail with the technological updating and production there.
					
					 Watching the workers at work before the furnace, he warmly encouraged them devoting themselves to production with patriotism.
					
					  Seeing the modern steel shop and CNC-based control room, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, workers and technicians of the enterprise are steadily increasing production after laying a solid material and technological foundation by their own efforts and with their technology. He highly appreciated their feats.
					
					 It is thanks to the devoted struggle of all the people including the workers and intellectuals that the WPK's idea of pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology is being translated into brilliant reality to consolidate the foundation of the DPRK's self-supporting national economy and put the level of the country's industrialization onto a higher  stage, he said, adding that this tremendous strength is providing a sure guarantee for accomplishing the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 He set forth the tasks facing the enterprise and expressed expectation and conviction that its workers would as ever successfully play the role as a vanguard and shock brigade in implementing the Party's economy policy.
					
					 The second leg of his guidance was the Jagang Machine Plant.
					
					  He went round a processing shop, assembling shop and other places of the plant.
					
					 Watching CNC-based machine tools that stand in rows at every worksite and products, he was greatly satisfied to learn that the workers of the plant are making leaping progress in the machine production by successfully putting the production processes on a modern and scientific basis. He highly estimated their feats. 
					
					  The most important task facing the plant is to dynamically push forward the work to radically increase the manufacture of new products, he said, underlining the need for the plant to continue dynamically dashing ahead towards a higher goal of science and technology on the basis of the achievements made in placing its production processes on a CNC basis.
					
					 The plant should set an example not only in modernizing itself but in establishing cultured practices in production and hygiene, he said, expressing expectation and conviction that the officials and other working people of the plant would register greater successes in production and technological updating in the future, too.
					
					 The third leg of his guidance was the February 8 General Machine Plant.
					
					 Watching the worksites that look like a palace and new machines that stand in rows, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, workers and technicians of the plant successfully carried out the technological updating of all the production processes by pooling efforts with teachers and researchers from Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 The teachers and students of the university are treasures of the country as they are successfully playing a vanguard role in putting industry on a modern and scientific basis, he said, highly praising them for remaining intensely loyal to the Party and the revolution.
					
					 He met with those who greatly contributed to the drive to study and introduce cutting-edge technology and appreciated their patriotic deeds.
					
					 Looking at varieties of daily necessities produced by the plant, he said they are useful and good products. It is of weighty significance in improving the standard of people's living for the central industrial enterprises to boost the production of varieties of daily necessities by making an effective use of by-products. 
					
					 Then he made the rounds of supply service facilities including a canteen and took warm care of the living of workers.
					
					  Seeing buildings kept neat and tidy in a thick forest and the compound of the plant which look like a thick woodland and greenery, he highly praised the workers of the plant for having spruced up their workplace to meet the need of the era of Songun with ardent patriotism and love for it.
					
					 He advanced the tasks facing the plant and expressed great expectation and conviction that the workers of the plant would bring about uninterrupted innovations and leap forward in the van of the drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge in the building of a thriving nation under the uplifted red flag of the revolution.
					
					 Never has the dignity of the nation been exalted so highly and never have the Korean people felt so confident of the future as today when they are reviewing a century-long history of Kim Il Sung's Korea, he said, once again ardently calling on them to realize the desire of President Kim Il Sung to build a thriving nation without fail by giving full rein to the Songun Chollima and putting further spurs to the  general offensive till a final victory is won in the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Ju Yong Sik, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Niger
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Niger
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Mahamadou Issoufou on his election as president of Niger.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Niger would grow stronger in the common interests, the message wished him success in his work for the development of his country and national unity.

articles.title: KAPPC Spokesman on New State Measure for Tour of Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
KAPPC Spokesman on New State Measure for Tour of Mt. Kumgang
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee (KAPPC) issued a statement on Friday, three years after the unilateral suspension of tour of Mt. Kumgang by the south Korean authorities.
					 It is deplorable that the tour of Mt. Kumgang which had lasted for ten years as a symbol of cooperation between the north and the south and reunification was ruthlessly suspended in less than five months after the present south Korean authorities took office, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is well known that the south Korean authorities are avoiding the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang not because they are concerned about the personal safety of tourists but because they consider it as part of the sanctions against the DPRK to block the tour, regarding it as someone's means for "earning money."
					
					 This is an unpardonable insult and mockery of the DPRK and all the fellow countrymen.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the DPRK has conducted a deficit operation by giving the south side the greatest special benefit as regards the tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 It has exercised utmost patience for nearly three years. There is no more prospect of resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang. 
					
					 This situation compels the DPRK to opt for exercising its right as the party to the agreement according to its law and international law.
					
					 In this regard it informed the Hyundai side of its stand that it may terminate the validity of the provision of the agreement on tour of Mt. Kumgang signed with the Hyundai side which calls for granting it monopoly over the tour, the DPRK may take charge of the tour through the areas of the north side and entrust an overseas businessman with the tour and the Hyundai group may continue conducting the tour through the areas of the south side and formally handed an official document related to it to the side.
					
					 Accordingly, the KAPPC and the General Guidance Bureau for the Development of Scenic Spots of the DPRK proposed a relevant organ of the DPRK to take a legal measure as regards the tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 A state measure will be taken soon to renew the tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 The Hyundai side's loss of the exclusive right to conduct the tour of Mt. Kumgang is entirely attributable to the south Korean authorities' moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and scuttle the tourism.
					
					 Trust and cooperation between the DPRK and the Hyundai Group will go on in the future, too, and the DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to realize the desire of the south Koreans to tour Mt. Kumgang.

articles.title: Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman 
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture Friday to celebrate the 18th anniversary of the election of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and other senior officials of the party, state and army. 
					
					 A report was made by Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the General Staff of the KPA. 
					
					 The reporter said that the election of Kim Jong Il to the top post of the NDC helped steadfastly carry forward the Songun tradition of the Korean revolution, which was started and has advanced with arms and provided a  sure guarantee for the ever-victorious future of Kim Il Sung's Korea. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the basic socialist political mode and comprehensively applied it to all fields of the revolution and construction, ushering in a new era of the Juche-oriented revolution, the era of Songun, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il perfectly solved the issue of political mode and structural system of the state on the principle of putting main emphasis on national defence reflecting the situation prevailing in the country and the requirements of the Korean revolution. This constitutes a great exploit performed by him as he provided an all-powerful treasured sword for winning a shining victory in the defence of the socialist country and the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle and strengthening and developing the DPRK and accomplishing the socialist cause. 
					
					 The sacred chronicle of the DPRK adorned with victory and glory goes to clearly prove that the Songun political mode and the state structural system on the principle of putting main emphasis on national defence provide a sure guarantee for protecting the socialist system and the destiny of the people, eternally glorifying the country as the state of Kim Il Sung and completing the Korean revolution with arms to the last. 
					
					 The whole country is closely united as a community linked with the common destiny of the whole party, army and all people with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader as the core. This single-minded unity serves as the source of inexhaustible strength of Songun Korea demonstrating as an invincible politico-ideological power and a powerful driving force for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 The reporter called on all the service persons and people to confidently advance along the road of victory indicated by him, bearing deep in mind the honor and happiness of carving out the new chronicle of building a thriving nation and winning the victory of revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the center of unity for the Songun revolution and the center of idea and leadership. 
					
					 National defence is the most important affair in building a thriving nation. It is the invariable principled stand of the WPK and the DPRK to give top priority to boosting the defence capability. 
					
					 Referring to the provocative and aggressive nuclear war exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group against the DPRK, the reporter declared: The army and people of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to them but resolutely frustrate them with the might of Songun which has been built up in every way.

articles.title: Deputies to SPA Tour Pyongyang and Enjoy Performance
articles.content:
Deputies to SPA Tour Pyongyang and Enjoy Performance 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly who participated in the Fourth Session of the 12th SPA of the DPRK visited the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute and the Pyongyang Floricultural Institute on Friday.
					 They looked round a water culture greenhouse, solar-heated vinyl sheet-roofed hothouse, bio-engineering research room and other places of the institutes. 
					
					 They also visited an ostrich farm on the outskirts of Pyongyang on Friday.
					
					 Earlier, they enjoyed a performance given by the State Merited Chorus.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Congratulates Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Congratulates Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Doyen of the Corps Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy in Pyongyang, conveyed them to an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in China
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in China 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of families of those who are related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle took place at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on April 6 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Present there were the DPRK ambassador to China and staff members of the embassy. 
					
					The participants laid floral baskets before the portraits of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il before enjoying the Korean film "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 Speeches were made by Yu Guang, son of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter Li Zade; Zhang Jinlu, daughter of anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr Zhang Weihua; Feng Yila, daughter of Feng Zhongyun who is related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle; Zhang Zhuoya, daughter of Zhang Shou-jian, and others. 
					
					 They said that they could not repress their yearning for the President and reverence for him whenever greeting the Day of the Sun, his birthday. With deep impression they called back on the warm loving care and benevolence shown by the President for the younger generations of those who fought together with him during the past anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 They referred to the President's exploits for the development of the DPRK-China friendship. The President is not only the great leader of the Korean people but also the greatest man recognized by the world, they said. 
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Il, true to the intention of the President, has invariably shown loving care for them and put the Sino-DPRK friendship provided by the revolutionaries of the elder generation of the two countries on a higher stage. 
					
					 Expressing belief that the Korean people would win bigger victory in building a thriving nation, they said that they would value the Sino-DPRK friendship forged by the forerunners and carry it forward for all ages.

articles.title: Art Performances Prepared to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Art Performances Prepared to Mark Day of Sun  
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Celebrations are under preparation throughout the DPRK with the approach of President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (April 15), known as the Day of the Sun.
					 The State Planning Commission is preparing an art performance including "Our Leader", "Song of the Sun Will Echo Forever" and other songs praising the President for having saved the nation's destiny and built socialist society centered on the masses in the country.
					
					 The Pyongyang City Land and Environmental Management Bureau is also making preparations for an art performance.
					
					The performance includes story-telling pieces about the President's great life devoted to the people's happiness.
					
					 The Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, honored with the President's field guidance, plans to have a dancing party to celebrate the holiday.
					
					 The Rihyon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang, is getting ready for celebrations with singing to the accompaniment of national musical instruments.

articles.title: Premier Soccer League Goes On
articles.content:
Premier Soccer League Goes On
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The second round of the premier soccer league for 2011 is going on at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang as part of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest. 
					 Twelve men's and eight women's teams are competing in the matches which started on March 27.
					
					 The second round continues till April 28.
					
					 The Rimyongsu men's and Ponghwasan women's teams won the first round held in February and March.

articles.title: Chujin Tourist Resort
articles.content:
Chujin Tourist Resort
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- There is the Chujin tourist resort in Rason City, DPRK.
					 The resort includes a beach, hotel with an accommodation for more than 100 persons and other service facilities.   
					
					 Kang Myong Hwa, manager of the hotel, told KCNA that the hotel will be enlarged and its surrounding environment improved along with the developing tourism in the area.

articles.title: Universal Free Education System
articles.content:
Universal Free Education System
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- All the educational institutions of the DPRK started a new school year on April 1.
					 After the liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, the country abolished the Japanese imperialists' colonial slavery educational system as part of socio-economic reforms and established a popular and democratic educational system available for all people.
					
					 The country introduced free education in a stepwise way along with the buildup of economic foundations. 
					
					 It was from Juche 48 (1959) that the free education system has been introduced in all the educational institutions, including colleges and universities, in the country under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 University and college students and boarding students of secondary schools No. 1 study on a scholarship.
					
					 Great are benefits one enjoys from the state during all their school days.

articles.title: Korean April 26 Children's Film Studio
articles.content:
Korean April 26 Children's Film Studio 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean April 26 Children's Film Studio was founded on September 7, Juche 46 (1957).
					 It has produced a large number of interesting films suitable for children's mentality since it created a puppet film "Mysterious Peach" and an animated film "Golden Axe and Iron Axe" in 1960.
					
					 A serial "The Clever Raccoon Dog" has made a hit at home and abroad.
					
					 "A Winged Horse" and "Ants Roll a Melon" won diplomas at the 10th Red Cross and Public Health Film Festival held in Varna, Bulgaria in 1985 and "A Boy Defeats Robbers" a gold torch prize at the 1st International Film Festival of Non-aligned and Developing Countries.
					
					 The studio has renewed itself with latest equipment and apparatuses.
					
					 Its films are popular in other countries for their good themes and diverse methods of representation.
					
					 The studio has made joint ventures with its partners in China, Philippines, France, Italy and other countries.

articles.title: Great Feats in Guiding DPRK
articles.content:
Great Feats in Guiding DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- April 9 marks the 18th anniversary of Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Over the last 18 years, he has conducted energetic activities to defend the country and the revolution and pave a way for building a thriving nation on the basis of Songun (military-first) politics. 
					
					 He, basing himself on the principle that the army is just the party, the state and the people, has paid primary attention to strengthening the army, the core of the self-reliant defence power. 
					
					 His continuous army inspection tour has encouraged the soldiers to fully demonstrate their mettle and might as the main force of the Juche-oriented revolution.
					
					 Under his leadership, the country's defence industry has steadily developed to manufacture up-to-date military equipment needed for modernizing the entire army, putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a fortress.
					
					 It is also under his guidance that tremendous achievements have been made in the economic sector.
					
					 High-tech machines have been manufactured and new iron and fiber production processes based on locally available materials and fuel built in the country.

articles.title: Tower of Juche Idea Draws Many Foreigners
articles.content:
Tower of Juche Idea Draws Many Foreigners
						
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Many foreign guests visit the Tower of the Juche Idea standing on the banks of the picturesque River Taedong.
					 From the beginning of the year it has been visited by the minister of Public Security of China and his party, a delegation of the Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia, a delegation of the Ministry of Communication and Information Technology of Indonesia, AP president and his party and many other foreigners.
					
					 The tower is a monument dedicated to President Kim Il Sung, who founded the immortal Juche idea and indicated the way to be followed by humankind.
					
					 After visiting the tower, Kalevi Wahrman, head of a delegation of the Finnish Communists' League, wrote in the visitor's book that the Juche idea, created by the President and enriched by leader Kim Jong Il, illumines the way ahead of the people aspiring after independence.
					
					Chairman of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal Subash Kaji Shrestha, who visited the DPRK several times, wrote that the Juche idea ushered in a new era of independence when the masses carve out their destiny in an independent and creative way.
					
					 He expressed his willingness to invigorate activities for the study and dissemination of the idea.

articles.title: Laser-based Seed Processing Technology Developed
articles.content:
Laser-based Seed Processing Technology Developed
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Laser Research Institute of the DPRK has developed a laser-based seed processing technology.
					 Its scientists confirmed the index constants most suitable for seed processing by use of laser and invented a device based on the technology.
					
					 The device simultaneously makes dormancy breaking and sterilization of seeds.
					
					 It also makes it possible to sharply raise the seed-sprouting rate and decrease the consumption of seeds.
					
					 The crops of the laser-processed seeds are strong in resistance to drought and infections, economizing work force and insecticides and ensuring high and stable yield. 
					
					 The new technology cuts the growth period of crops by 7 to 10 days, which is conducive to double farming.
					
					 It has proved effective in some co-op farms.

articles.title: S. Korea's Crimes Committed for Three Years of Office under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Crimes Committed for Three Years of Office under Fire
  Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea published an indictment Friday disclosing the crimes the south Korean authorities committed for three years of their office ill-famed for lies and deception and the disastrous consequences entailed by them. 
					According to it, the south Korean economy has become more stagnant and the people's living deteriorated to an extreme pitch while irregularities and corruption and social vices have become rampant. Due to the economic bankruptcy the puppet government is saddled with debt amounting to 1,448.6 billion U.S. dollars, that of enterprises is 1,155 billion U.S. dollars and that of the inhabitants households more than 700 billion U.S. dollars.
					
					 There are at least 4.6 million unemployed people and more than 8.6 million under-employed people. 
					
					 Various kinds of taxes are on a steady increase. There are three million extremely poor households which eke out their living by a meal offered by charity bodies. The poor who make their living on a daily earning number ten million and the children who go without lunches number more than 1.2 million. 
					
					 More than 7 million households or 38 percent of all of them live in rented rooms. There are 680 000 households that live in small rooms like hencoop, shacks, dugouts and cave-like places, left without any proper shelters. 
					
					 1.25 million women find no other means but prostitution, unable to endure abject poverty. 
					
					 42 persons commit suicides on a daily average due to the unbearable economic difficulties and destitution, topping the world list of suicide rate. 
					
					 It has become clear that the most of 16 major economy policy commitments made by the puppet conservative group have no prospect of fulfillment. 
					
					 The "National Assembly", administration, prosecution and media have become a marionette serving the one-man dictatorship. 
					
					 Various repressive machines including the puppet National Intelligence Service have been dramatically reinforced while the political investigation has been revived and there reappeared the Paekgol Corps which earned an ill-fame in the days of the erstwhile military fascist dictatorial regime. 
					
					The dissident groups have been purged en mass from the "government", public organs and different media organs. More than 10,000 public servants and over 19,000 personnel of public institutions have been expelled for the past three years.
					
					  The organizations and trade unions which had been formed as legal organizations under the previous regimes have been labeled illegal ones and the religious organizations that incurred the authorities' displeasure have become targets of suppression after being branded as heretical ones. 
					
					 Thousands of demonstrators were wounded due to suppression and arrested for the past three years. 
					
					 The just struggles of workers for the right to existence have also been brutally suppressed.
					
					  The group has driven the inter-Korean relations into the worst catastrophe during the period. 
					
					 The moves of the group brought the contacts and exchanges to suspension though they had made good progress in an atmosphere of reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 The Red Cross humanitarian undertakings including the reunion of separated families and relatives have not been properly carried out due to the dishonest attitude of the group. 
					
					 It has brutally suppressed the reunification movement organizations, non-governmental organizations and personages that advocated reconciliation, unity and exchange and cooperation on charges of violation of the "National Security Law", a fascist law, after labeling them "pro-north" and "enemy-benefiting" organizations and persons and "spies." 
					
					 It has gone to extremes in its anti-DPRK confrontation rackets and moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK, blinded by its ambition to achieve "unification under liberal democracy" and take advantage of "contingency".
					
					 What the seizure of power by the puppet group has brought the south Korean people is nothing but frustration, pain and sacrifices. 
					
					 The group is making last-ditch efforts to tone down the public anger now on the brink of explosion in a bid to tide over its serious ruling crisis. 
					
					 The more desperately the group pursues the fascist dictatorship and confrontation with fellow countrymen against the nation's will, the earlier it will face its final destruction, warned the indictment.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Japan's Decision to Extend Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Japan's Decision to Extend Sanctions against DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government at a Cabinet meeting on April 5 decided to extend sanctions against the DPRK for one more year.
					 Japan has unilaterally applied sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 It is the 7th time that it took the extension measure since it began applying sanctions against the DPRK in July 2006.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, this is ridiculous, shameless and wicked action which can be done only by those steeped in the bitterness toward the DPRK to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 The Japanese government faulted the peaceful nuclear activities of the DPRK when taking the decision.
					
					 It is preposterous for Japan to take issue with the peaceful nuclear activities of the DPRK now that its failed security measures at a nuclear power plant have touched off growing international concern.
					
					 The successive explosions at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant and the leakage of massive amounts of radioactive materials plunged humankind into a horrible nuclear disaster. Japan can never evade responsibility for it.
					
					 The Japanese government even allowed the flow of huge amounts of contaminated water into the sea without prior notice, endangering the life and security of the people in the surrounding areas. This also has sparked off protest and denunciation.
					
					 It is clear to everybody that it is Japan which should be subject to sanctions.
					
					 This being a hard fact, Japan decided to extend sanctions against the DPRK, far from bringing its family trouble under control and making an apology to the international community. This proves to what extent it has gone in its policy to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The recent decision only discloses its moral vulgarity.
					
					 The Japanese government had better bring the living of the people in the tsunami-stricken people to normal and take measures to prevent damage by radioactivity, instead of whiling time away at a time of crisis.

articles.title: KCNA Denounces Unpopular Policy of S. Korean Ruling Quarters
articles.content:
KCNA Denounces Unpopular Policy of S. Korean Ruling Quarters
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The present ruling forces in south Korea are becoming evermore undisguised in their unpopular policy.
					 This is evidenced by the fact that some days ago the chief executive of south Korea cancelled the plan for building a new civilian airport quite contrary to the will of the people.
					
					 The plan was one of his election commitments made in 2007. But this was a big political fraud to garner votes though he had no intention to fulfill it as the south Korean paper Kyunghyang Daily News put it on April 1. After realizing their wild ambition for power by running the whole gamut of gimmicks, the south Korean ruling forces frantically pursued the unpopular policy meeting the interests of the privileged circles and their clan.
					
					 The plan was cancelled in pursuance of the policy. They have perpetrated too many acts against the people's mind-set. They include the import of American beef harmful to the lives and health of the south Korean people, projects for improving the four big rivers and the "revised plan for the construction of Sejong City".
					
					 These crimes are very dangerous as they are nothing but the last-ditch efforts of the forces driven into the inescapable abyss of ruin by the popular masses' denunciation and protests.
					
					 The reckless efforts made by the south Korean authorities to step up the unpopular policy cannot be construed otherwise than a desperate bid to achieve the "political" purpose which the conservative forces have pursued for the last decade they termed "lost decade."
					
					 The more vicious the puppet group gets in its moves, the more saliently it will reveal its true colors as the wicked enemy of the people.
					
					 Media of south Korea reported that "furor" sparked by the cancellation of the above-said plan "would not easily subside." This clearly suggests the firm will of the public to judge the present ruling forces. Those forsaken by the people are bound to suffer bitter fiasco. The south Korean authorities are destined to face a stern judgment by the people as they are keen on the unpopular policy, bereft of reason.

articles.title: KCNA Queries If War Exercises Reflect "Sentiment of People"
articles.content:
KCNA Queries If War Exercises Reflect "Sentiment of People" 
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- South Korea has become all the more undisguised in war exercises before and after April 5, one of the 24 seasonal divisions.
					 The 8th Corps of the puppet army staged big military exercises on April 4 and 5 in the Ryongdong area covering from Kosong to Samchok of Kangwon Province of south Korea with all the armed forces under the corps involved.
					
					 The puppet air force kicked off military exercises on April 4 which will last till April 8 under the pretext of ensuring the unity of action with the U.S. air force in combat preparation and flight operations. 
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the military exercises are crime against humanity. South Korea only pursues war and confrontation in disregard of peace and beautiful manners and customs of the Korean people handed down through generations.
					
					 The Koreans have the laudable custom of visiting graves of their ancestors with families, relatives and neighbors to arrange them in proper shape and call back on the deceased on April 5 in the thawing season.
					
					 It is peculiar to this day for all to be in silent reverence, something different from the Lunar New Year's Day and the January 15th of the lunar calendar, Korea's traditional holidays.
					
					 But the south Korean military group conducted frantic war exercises in the sky and on the land, throwing people into extreme horror and uneasiness.
					
					 We would like to ask if this reflects "the sentiment of the people."
					
					 The military group, referring to national holidays, called for "taking the sentiment of the people into consideration" at the hard-won talks for the north-south dialogue this year as it did last year and finally brought the talks to rupture.
					
					 The reality proves that "the sentiment of the people" touted by the puppet group is only a makeshift used by it whenever it deemed necessary to scuttle the dialogue.
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the puppet clique to hush up the public opinion in demand of the switchover in its vicious policy for confrontation with the DPRK while giving impression that it is interested in the dialogue.
					
					 The criminal act of the group which incites confrontation between the north and the south of Korea and fans up war atmosphere with the deceptive rhetoric about the "sentiment of the people" is intolerable.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Reunification Action Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Reunification Action Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in a commentary on April 5 denounced the puppet Ministry of Unification for its anti-reunification action.
					 The commentary recalled that the ministry that day turned down the application made by south Korean non-governmental organizations for having contact for holding talks with the north under the pretext of the present inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are going from bad to worse because the authorities are spearheading the confrontation with the north and encouraging conservative organizations in their anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering campaigns, while shifting the blame for the "Cheonan" warship sinking case and the Yonphyong Island shelling case onto the north, it held, and continued:
					
					 The non-governmental organizations' proposed contact with the north was prompted by their desire to defuse the confrontation.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Ministry of Unification disallowed the contact, asserting that it is not appropriate to have any contact with the north.    This action stemmed from its consciousness of confrontation.
					
					 It is deplorable, indeed, that the inter-Korean cooperation and exchange are being blocked due to the traitors' consciousness of confrontation.
					
					 The Ministry of Unification would be well advised to properly know about the resentment of the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage DPRK-targeted War Maneuvers
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage DPRK-targeted War Maneuvers 
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military authorities are planning to stage war maneuvers against the DPRK in the vicinity of Hwasong City, Kyonggi Province and the area of Kanghwa Island on April 7 and 8, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 They are to mobilize huge armed forces including the puppet Metropolitan Garrison Command and all units under it, the 2nd Division of the Marine Corps, the Air Operation Command of the army and units for special warfare in the military exercises, vociferating about "infiltration" and "local provocation" by someone.
					
					 Such provocative war racket is touching off bitter resentment of all the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Opt for Dialogue with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Opt for Dialogue with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Regional Headquarters of the Commonwealth of Independent States of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on April 3 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country".
					 The work serves as a political programme as it clearly indicates the orientation and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification by the concerted efforts of the whole nation, the statement said.
					
					The patriotic idea of great national unity enunciated by the President is being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, it noted.
					
					 It is an event to be specially recorded in the history of the reunification movement that Kim Jong Il provided the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, bringing about an epochal phase of independent reunification and great national unity, it said.
					
					 It denounced the present ruling forces of south Korea for bringing to collapse the north-south relations which had headed toward reconciliation and unity, turning their faces away from the magnanimous steps of the DPRK while seeking confrontation with it, and getting frantic in their anti-DPRK smear campaign and moves for a war against it.
					
					 The Koreans will never allow any moves against national unity and reunification, the statement said, demanding the south Korean authorities opt for sincere dialogue with the DPRK at an early date.

articles.title: Rescue Activities for Korean Quake Victims in Japan Conducted
articles.content:
Rescue Activities for Korean Quake Victims in Japan Conducted
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans' organizations are stepping up the rescue activities for Korean quake- and tsunami-victims in Japan. 
					 The Higashinari Branch of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in an article addressed to the compatriots in Tohoku area expressed deep consolation and sympathy to the compatriots who suffered a lot from massive quake and the ensuing tsunami and the bereaved families.
					
					 Recalling that Chongryon officials and compatriots on the spot are finding out the disaster-stricken compatriots and helping even Japanese by pooling efforts, the organization added this instilled into the compatriots the conviction that the Korean community and Korean schools in Tohoku are sure to be rehabilitated.
					
					 Expressing hope that the living of the above-said compatriots would return to normal at an early date and rehabilitation make progress, the organization declared that the officials and compatriots under the branch would render every possible help to them.
					
					 Meanwhile, the General Association of Young Koreans in China sent a message of sympathy to the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan and the U.S. Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to the Japanese Regional Committee of the committee and they are conducting fund-raising campaigns for the Korean victims.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Il from KFA Chairman
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Il from KFA Chairman 
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter from a preparatory committee of the Korean Friendship Association (KFA) for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on March 31.
					 It was presented to Kim Jong Il by Chairman of the KFA Alejandro Cao de Benos on behalf of the committee.
					
					 The letter said:
					
					 The life of the President possessed of extraordinary wisdom, outstanding leadership art and noble virtues which no other great man in the world could ever have was a sacred history of the most prominent revolutionary who performed immortal exploits in accomplishing the cause of independence of the working people for 70 years.
					
					 He was the lodestar of the Korean nation who paved a wide avenue for achieving the reunification of Korea through his energetic activities till the last moments of his life, guided by his noblest and ardent patriotic idea. 
					
					 He was a world political elder who made distinguished contributions to the struggle for accomplishing the cause of independence of the world.
					
					 The President's noble cause of independence is being successfully carried forward by you and thanks to your outstanding leadership socialist Korea is shedding its brilliant rays as a country of Songun and a beacon of hope for the world progressives.
					
					 The recent Internet book and photo exhibition provided us an opportunity to deeply understand the immortal exploits performed by the President for the Korean revolution and global independence and the validity of the Korean people's struggle for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation as indicated by the milestone of history set by you as well as the invincibility of Songun Korea
					
					 The KFA will conduct more dynamic activities for supporting the Korean people in their drive to build a thriving nation and achieve independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we express belief that the Korean people will surely fling open the gate to a thriving nation, meeting all challenges of history under your wise leadership, concluded the letter.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Regional Body
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on April 1 posted on its Internet website photos and art pieces on the revolutionary life of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Internet website said in an article titled "Kim Il Sung's Far-sighted Wisdom" as follows:
					
					 Building a thriving nation was the President's lifelong desire.
					
					 The Korean people keenly realized through their life experience that Kim Il Sung's desire will surely come true when they believe as in Heaven as the President who clearly indicated the way for the Korean people with his far-sighted wisdom. 
					
					 The website carried several anecdotes dealing with his far-sighted wisdom. A bright future is in store for the DPRK and the drive of building a thriving nation is victoriously advancing thanks to his foresightedness and wise leadership, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Uruguay
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Uruguay
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A gist of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was carried in detail by the Uruguayan paper La Juventud on March 27.
					 This work was published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993). It clarifies the issue of founding a unified state through the unity of the whole nation, the issue of attaining unity on the basis of love for the nation and the spirit of national independence, the issues of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests, putting a halt to all political strife which stokes division and confrontation among fellow countrymen, realizing mutual trust and unity between the north and the south, etc.
					
					 It also comprehensively indicates the ways of realizing great national unity including the matter of not rejecting those with different ideology and ism but joining hands with each other on the road for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Observed
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Observed
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Internet book and photo exhibition was held from March 13 to 31 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. It was sponsored by the preparatory committee of the Korean Friendship Association to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The special page of the exhibition was set on the association's Internet homepage. Its theme was "The Great Leader President Kim Il Sung Will Always Live in the Hearts of Humankind" and it was made up of main and sectional pages.
					
					Carried in the main page was an article with the portraits of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK has made progress under the banner of the Juche idea, holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem, the article said, adding that this made it possible for the DPRK to demonstrate its might as a dignified socialist power and greet the gigantic new era for building a thriving nation while recording the heroic epic of world-startling creation and change.
					
					 The article said that it is the steadfast faith and will of Kim Jong Il to glorify the DPRK forever as Kim Il Sung's Korea winning victory and prospering with his idea and exploits no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.
					
					 The upcoming decades of the 21st century will continue to shine as those of the great victory of the experienced and tested politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, it noted.
					
					 Edited in the sectional page made up of book, photo and Korean film categories were works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with photos showing the revolutionary history and feats of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It carried scenes showing the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as well as videos introducing the Korean people in their struggle for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and the beautiful scenery of Songun Korea.
					
					 More than 7,236,000 people in different countries accessed the special page during the period of the exhibition.
					
					 Kim Jong Il received a letter from Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, as regards the successful exhibition.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Field Guidance Reported in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Field Guidance Reported in Russia
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided on-site guidance to industrial establishments in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, the 13th issue of the Russian newspaper Patriot reported.
					 The paper said that Kim Jong Il recently looked round the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the Hungnam Smeltery and the Hamhung Woolen Mill.
					
					 The paper continued:
					
					  Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the unprecedented upswing of production being waged by the workers of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex with patriotic zeal.
					
					 He highly praised the workers of the Hungnam Smeltery for having made varieties of building parts and daily necessities by making the effective use of byproducts.
					
					 Visiting the Hamhung Woolen Mill the site of which was chosen by President Kim Il Sung on Oct. 7 1961, Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the production of the various kinds of quality spinning and weaving products at the Converting and Spinning Shop.
					
					 The paper also carried photos of Kim Jong Il providing field guidance to the industrial establishments.

articles.title: Strong Earthquake Hits Japan Again
articles.content:
Strong Earthquake Hits Japan Again
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- 7.4-magnetude of earthquake hit Tohoku area of Japan on April 7, causing damage.
					 The epicenter was about 40 km under water off Miyagi Prefecture.
					
					 Tsunami sirens wailed in the northeastern area of the country immediately after the quake.
					
					 It was reported that serious jolt lasted for one minute in Sendai and it was felt in Tokyo more than 300 km away from the epicenter.
					
					 The quake left two persons dead and at least 100 wounded as of April 8.
					
					 It brought nuclear power plants and thermal power stations to the suspension of operation, caused fires in different places, train service to a halt and left 4 million households in Iwate and Aomori prefectures and other places without the supply of electricity.
					
					 Damage is predicted to steadily increase.
					
					 The above-said quake is considered to be aftershock of massive earthquake which occurred on March 11, the Japan Meteorological Agency said, predicting that aftershock of over 7.0-magnitude may occur in the future.

articles.title: Radiation Expands in Japan
articles.content:
Radiation Expands in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The radiation caused by the accident at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant in Japan is further expanding. 
					According to foreign press reports, radioactive cesium of 15,000Bq per kg was detected in the soil of a village 40 km away from the above-said power plant.
					
					 Cesium more than 44 times the allowable level was again detected on spinach cultivated in the area of that village. 
					
					 The number of species of vegetables contaminated with radiation beyond the legal level increased to 26 as now. 
					
					 The results of an analysis of a sample of seawater 113 to 160 m under water off a Pacific coastal area led to the detection of iodine-131 of 4.8 Bq per litre and cesium-137 of 11.4 Bq. 
					
					 Radioactive iodine was detected on crops including spinach cultivated in Beijing, Tianjin and Hunan Province of China.
					
					 The situation at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant is deteriorating.
					
					 Reactor No. 1 of the power plant from which radioactive substance is ceaselessly leaking is in the danger of explosion, raising a problem. 
					
					 The Japanese Tokyo Shimbun said on April 7 that the seabed reference point above the epicenter about 130 km under water off the Oshika Peninsula, Miyagi Prefecture, which caused the recent massive quake moved about 24 m east-southeast and rose 3 m, adding that the earth's crust change of the seabed surpassing 20 m has not been confirmed so far internally and externally.
					
					According to the data released by the Japan National Police Agency, the death toll caused by the quake and the ensuing tsunami increased to 12,731 as of 10 a.m. on Friday.

articles.title: Japanese Business Confidence Fall after Great Quake
articles.content:
Japanese Business Confidence Fall after Great Quake
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Japanese large manufacturers are becoming pessimistic about the country's economic conditions.
					 A credit research institute said on April 5 that the index for Japanese companies' business confidence in its March 23-31 survey came to 31.6, down 3.8 points, a sharp decline following its 4.1-point fall in December 2008.

articles.title: China Reiterates Its Policy Not to Become First to Use Nuclear Weapons
articles.content:
China Reiterates Its Policy Not to Become First to Use Nuclear Weapons
 Beijing, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Information Office of the State Council of China in its recent white paper "China's National Defence in 2010" clarified that China has consistently maintained the policy not to become the first to use nuclear weapons in any period and under any circumstances. 
					 The white paper said that China has invariably called for a total ban and thorough elimination of nuclear weapons, adding that it has never evaded its disarmament commitment as a permanent member of the UN Security Council and a signatory to the NPT but pursued an open, clear-cut and responsible nuclear policy. 
					
					 China recognizes the fact that the world missile defence program upsets the international strategic equilibrium and stability, is unfavorable to the world and regional security and adversely affects the nuclear disarmament process, stressed the white paper.

articles.title: China Rejects Arms Race in Space
articles.content:
China Rejects Arms Race in Space
						
 Beijing, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Chinese government reiterated its stand opposing the arms race in the space.
					 The recently published white paper "China's National Defence in 2010" made it clear that the Chinese government has consistently asserted the use of the space for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It is the most effective way for the international community to adopt a document of international law to prevent the development of the space weapons and arms race in the space through talks, it noted.

articles.title: Russian FM Blasts West's Special Organs' Actions against Libya
articles.content:
Russian FM Blasts West's Special Organs' Actions against Libya
 Moscow, April 6 (KCNA) -- Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov branded the recent intensified actions of West's special organs against Libya as interference in it.
					 Such actions are a breach of the UNSC's resolution 1973 calling for protecting civilians, he noted, adding that some countries are misusing the resolution, taking advantage of the fact that its paragraphs are so ambiguously worded that they can interpret the standard for use of force.
					
					 Holding that it is the best way to put an end to the military actions against Libya and immediately start dialogue with it, he stressed that Libya should be left to decide its future by Libyans themselves free from foreign interference.

articles.title: Russia Chides Japan's Approval of New Textbooks
articles.content:
Russia Chides Japan's Approval of New Textbooks
Moscow, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Russian Foreign Ministry accused the Japanese authorities of approving new textbooks.
					 The expression "illegal occupation" of Southern Kurils reappeared on Japan's history and geography textbooks for middle schoolers approved by the Japanese Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology. In this connection the Russian Foreign Ministry clarified that Russia's sovereignty over the archipelago leaves no doubt as it was based on the results of the Second World War. 
					
					 The ministry said it could not but express regret at the Japanese authorities' act of implanting unfriendly spirit and attitude towards neighboring countries of Japan into the minds of the younger generation.

articles.title: Russian Spacecraft Heads for Int'l Space Station
articles.content:
Russian Spacecraft Heads for Int'l Space Station
 Moscow, April 6 (KCNA) -- Russian spacecraft Soyuz with Russian and American astronauts on board was launched from Baikonur space center toward the International Space Station on April 5.
					 Soyuz is expected to be landed on the space station on April 7, said the Russian Federal Space Agency.

articles.title: Missile Warship Launched in Russia
articles.content:
Missile Warship Launched in Russia
						
 Moscow, April 6 (KCNA) -- Missile warship Dagestan was launched in the Republic of Tatarstan of Russia recently.
					 This Gepard-class warship has a displacement of 2,100 tons. It is equipped with cruise missiles, surface-to-air missiles, artillery and AA complex, etc.

articles.title: Volcano More Active in Kamchatka, Russia
articles.content:
Volcano More Active in Kamchatka, Russia
 Moscow, April 6 (KCNA) -- Kizimen Volcano in Kamchatka, Russia, has become more active these days. 
					 Columns of gas dust have been seen gushing out of the volcano several times over the last few days.
					
					 One of them was 5,000 meters in height. It was reported that this put airplane service in danger.

articles.title: Kazakh Official Rejects OSCE's Criticism over His Country
articles.content:
Kazakh Official Rejects OSCE's Criticism over His Country
						
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- An adviser of Kazakh president on April 4 rejected criticisms of his country's presidential election by an observation mission from the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE).
					 The OSCE should surely admit the result of Kazakh presidential election, the adviser said as regards the criticism made by the OSCE's observation mission, which said there are no reforms necessary for holding genuine democratic elections over the presidential election in Kazakhstan.
					
					 It is true that the Kazakh president enjoyed popular support, he held, accusing the OSCE of having never supported the presidential elections in other countries.

articles.title: UN Chief Condemns Burning of Quran in US
articles.content:
UN Chief Condemns Burning of Quran in US
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The UN secretary general in a statement on April 5 condemned the recent burning of a copy of the Muslim holy book Quran in a U.S. church in Florida.
					 Such actions contradict the efforts of the United Nations and many people around the world to promote tolerance, intercultural understanding and mutual respect between cultures and religions, stressed the statement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye. 
					Estuvo primero en el Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye. 
					
					Se entero en detalles del estado de modernizacion tecnica y produccion recorriendo varios talleres y examinando nuevas maquinas.
					
					Al mirar las maquinas ultramodernas basadas en la tecnologia CNC y los productos de buena calidad, alineados en los talleres, se mostro muy satisfecho por la aplicacion de esa tecnologia en todos los procesos productivos y por el desarrollo vertiginoso dado en la produccion mediante la invencion de nuevas tecnologias. 
					
					Evaluo de altos los meritos de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica apuntando que ellos trasforman de modo revolucionario su fabrica y calificandolos de constructores verdaderos de la gran potencia prospera, de patriotas y ejecutores consecuentes de las orientaciones del partido. 
					
					Este combinado es modelo tanto en la modernizacion y la produccion como en el abastecimiento y suministro para los obreros y en el establecimiento de la cultura de vida y de trabajo, destaco y apunto que todas las unidades deben aprender las experiencias de los empleados de aqui.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion y la produccion de la fabrica, fijo la meta a ser alcanzada en un futuro cercano e ilumino el rumbo y remedios concretos para el respecto. 
					
					Luego, el Dirigente se dirigio a la Fabrica de Medicamentos Coryo de Kanggye.
					
					  Recorrio varios lugares de la fabrica para hacer conocimiento detallado de la modernizacion tecnica y produccion. 
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que la fabrica estuviera bien arreglada en lo higienico y cultural como una planta farmaceutica y produjera muchos medicamentos eficientes Coryo con hierbas medicinales abundantes en la localidad. 
					
					Los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica alcanzaron muchos exitos en la fabricacion de medicamentos tradicionales en forma de extractos y de modo cientifico, subrayo y reconocio sus inmensos esfuerzos por el fomento de salud del pueblo. 
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas que incumben a la fabrica. 
					
					Los medicamentos Coryo se consumen ampliamente en nuestro pais desde remota antiguedad, destaco y agrego que desarrollar esos farmacos tradicionales resulta muy importante para fomentar la salud del pueblo. 
					
					Esta fabrica tiene solida base material y tecnica para realizar la industrializacion y la cientifizacion de los medicamentos Coryo y abundantes experiencias, apunto y prosiguio que ella debe producirlos en grandes cantidades y suministrarlos a los ciudadanos de Kanggye y otros habitantes. 
					
					Todos los productos de esta fabrica deben ser agradables para la toma y eficientes en el tratamiento, senalo y apunto la necesidad de producir mucho mas medicinas populares que contribuyan a la salud publica. 
					
					Expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica registraran un nuevo viraje en la produccion de medicinas. 
					
					Le acompanaron Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buro Politico y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Ju Yong Sik, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la provincia de Jagang.

articles.title: Acto por 18o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como titular del CDN
articles.content:
Acto por 18o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como titular del CDN          
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 18o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC. 
					
					El informante senalo que gracias a la eleccion del Dirigente en el puesto cimero del CDN, continua firmemente la tradicion del Songun de la Revolucion Coreana, iniciada y avanzada con las fuerzas armadas, y se asegura el futuro victorioso de la Corea de       Kim Il Sung. 
					
					El Dirigente definio la politica de Songun como principal modo politico del socialismo y la materializa globalmente en todos los sectores de la revolucion y la construccion, de modo que se abriera la nueva era del Songun, la de la revolucion del Juche, dijo y continuo: 
					
					El Dirigente resolvio perfectamente en el principio de dar prioridad a la defensa nacional el problema de modo politico y el sistema de estructura estatal, reflejando la demanda de la situacion creada en el pais y de la Revolucion Coreana. Esta gran proeza hizo posible preparar el remedio omnipotente para lograr la victoria fulminante en la defensa de la patria socialista y en la confrontacion antiimperialista y antiyanqui, alcanzar el desarrollo de la RPDC y cumplir la causa socialista. 
					
					Los sagrados anales de la RPDC, coronados con victorias y glorias, comprueban que el modo politico del Songun y el sistema de estructura estatal centrados en la defensa nacional devienen la firme garantia para defender el regimen socialista y el destino del pueblo, glorificar para siempre la RPDC como el Estado de Kim Il Sung y cumplir con las fuerzas armadas la revolucion coreana iniciada con las mismas.
					
					La unidad monolitica cuyo nucleo es el espiritu de defender al lider a costa de la vida, segun la cual comparten el mismo destino todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo, constituye hoy la fuente del poderio inagotable de la Corea del Songun, invencible potencia ideo-politica, y la fuerza motriz de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Debemos avanzar a pasos firmes por la unica senda de victorias, guardando en lo profundo del corazon el honor y la felicidad por abrir la nueva era de construccion de la gran potencia prospera y de la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche enalteciendo al Dirigente como centro de la unidad de la revolucion del Songun y de la idea y direccion. 
					
					La defensa nacional es la maxima prioridad para la construccion de la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					El PTC y el Estado de la RPDC mantienen la invariable posicion de principios de canalizar las fuerzas primordiales al fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional. 
					
					Ahora los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos desarrollan los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de caracter provocativo y agresivo contra la RPDC. 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos no los observaran con brazos cruzados sino los frustraran tajantemente con el poderio del Songun consolidado por todos los medios.

articles.title: ATCC comenta la prolongacion de sancion anti-RPDC de Japon
articles.content:
ATCC comenta la prolongacion de sancion anti-RPDC de Japon
						
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- En la reunion de ministros efectuada el dia 5, el gobierno japones decidio por septima vez prolongar un ano mas el plazo de sancion que aplicaba independientemente contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea desde julio de 2006.
					Esa medida tan ridicula, cinica y malvada la pueden tomar solo los tipejos extremadamente hostiles a la RPDC.
					
					El gobierno japones la ha justificado esta vez pretextando las actividades nucleares de la RPDC para fines pacificos.
					
					Resulta absurda esa acusacion del gobierno japones justamente cuando este pone inquieta a la sociedad internacional por no haber manejado debidamente la seguridad de centrales nucleares.
					
					Japon no puede liberarse de la responsabilidad del macabro desastre nuclear impuesto a la humanidad a raiz de la explosion sucesiva de reactores de la planta nuclear de Fukushima y el subsiguiente escape de enormes radiaciones.
					
					Para colmo, el gobierno japones boto intencionalmente a las aguas maritimas inmensos residuos contaminados por la radiactividad sin ningun aviso previo, lo cual suscita las protestas y la condena de los pueblos vecinos por generar el peligro real para la vida de estos.
					
					Por lo tanto, esta claro para todos que las sanciones deben aplicarse a Japon.
					
					Sin embargo, Japon se dedica a dar prorroga a las medidas de sancion contra la RPDC en vez de pedir disculpas a la sociedad internacional y ocuparse de los asuntos de casa.
					
					Esto comprueba que a que grado llega su afan de aislar y atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					La polemica decision del gobierno japones demostro a todo el mundo la bajeza moral de los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					Las medidas, que deberia tomar el gobierno japones en estos dias turbulentos, no son las de sancion anticoreana sino las encaminadas a la estabilizacion de la vida de victimas del terremoto y a la disminucion de los danos de radiactividad.

articles.title: ATCC critica ejercicios belicos en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ATCC critica ejercicios belicos en Sur de Corea 
   Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- Antes y despues de Chongmyong (5 de abril, fiesta folclorica de Corea), tomaron auge los ejercicios de guerra que se desarrollan en el Sur de Corea. 
					   El cuerpo no. 8 del ejercito titere surcoreano desarrollo los dias 4 y 5 un ejercicio militar de gran envergadura movilizando a todos sus efectivos desplegados a lo largo de la zona de Ryongdong, o sea, desde Kosong hasta Samchok de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea. 
					
					   Las fuerzas aereas titeres iniciaron el dia 4 otro entrenamiento, que termina el dia 8, con el alegato de garantizar la coordinacion con la aviacion norteamericana en los preparativos de combate y las operaciones aereas. 
					
					   Resultan un crimen antietico tales acciones militares que persiguen solo la guerra y la confrontacion sin tomar en cuenta la paz ni las costumbres tradicionales de la nacion coreana. 
					
					   En Corea existe desde la antiguedad la costumbre de visitar en el dia de Chongmyong junto con los familiares, parientes y vecinos las tumbas de antepasados para arreglarlas y recordar a ellos.
					
					   A diferencia del jolgorio del Ano Nuevo y el 15 de enero lunar, otra fiesta folclorica, ese dia se caracteriza por la solemnidad y el respeto que guardan los hombres y mujeres de todas las edades en homenaje a sus antecesores.
					
					   Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos desataron ese dia el panico e inquietud librando en el cielo y la tierra freneticos ejercicios belicos. 
					
					   ?Esto es el reflejo del "sentimiento popular" de que hablan tanto ellos?
					
					   Habria que recordar que el circulo militar surcoreano habia llevado al fracaso el contacto de trabajo preparado dificilmente este ano para las conversaciones Norte-Sur diciendo que "se debe tomar en consideracion el sentimiento popular" durante las fiestas nacionales.  
					
					   Pero, esta vez, cometieron abiertamente los ejercicios belicos con motivo de Chongmyong, lo cual insinua que el "sentimiento popular" no pasa de ser un pretexto para romper el dialogo entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					   Los titeres surcoreanos fingen estar interesados en el dialogo y rehusan realmente el dialogo N-S con el fin de callar la opinion publica interna y externa que demanda el cambio de su politica conflictiva con la RPDC. 
					
					   No se puede perdonar nunca tal proceder criminal de la camarilla militar surcoreana.

articles.title: Pyongyang en visperas del 15 de Abril
articles.content:
Pyongyang en visperas del 15 de Abril
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- En visperas del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung), se escenifican por doquier de esta capital las escenas de canciones y bailes de los capitalinos que testimonian la gran veneracion a el.
					Entre ellos se distinguen los funcionarios del Comite Estatal de Planificacion que entonan con entusiasmo las canciones "Nuestro lider", "Sera eterna la cancion del Sol" y otras que alaban las proezas del Presidente quien salvo el destino de la nacion y construyo el socialismo centrado en las masas populares.
					
					  Esta en plena marcha en la Direccion de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental de la ciudad de Pyongyang la preparacion de la funcion del grupo artistico de los empleados para conmemorar la fiesta de abril.
					
					En sus piezas acompanadas de charla, los miembros del grupo muestran la grandiosa vida del Presidente que levanto en el territorio patrio un paraiso del pueblo apreciando mucho cada planta y cada arbol del pais.
					
					Entre tanto, los obreros de la Fabrica de Alambres Electricos 326 de Pyongyang preparan los programas de baile recordando las huellas de direccion del Presidente grabadas en su fabrica y reflejando en cada movimiento de danza su decision de coronar este ano con orgullos exitos de trabajo.
					
					Por otra parte, los agricultores de la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Rihyon del capitalino municipio de Sadong interpretan bien con instrumentos musicales nacionales las canciones que expresan la anoranza al Presidente.
